messages.text: [AVATAR=0] Welcome to the Narratix demo! [AVATAR=1] Here, you'll see our interactive dialogue system in action. [AVATAR=2] Notice how the text appears like a typewriter, line by line, with color highlights.

[AVATAR=1] Each message can contain multiple avatars, changing automatically mid-text. [AVATAR=0] The small arrow at the bottom indicates when you can proceed. [AVATAR=2] Click or tap to speed up the text or move to the next chunk.

[AVATAR=0] You can see how the system splits text into two-line chunks for better readability. [AVATAR=1] The overlay also subtly moves the HUD to make space for dialogue. [AVATAR=2] Finally, Betty reacts with breathing animations and expressive faces for immersion.
[AVATAR=1] That's the core of our demo: interactive storytelling with smooth animations, avatar reactions, and a typewriter style crawler. [AVATAR=0] Enjoy exploring the system!
